text: mariyu miru adi grantham lonidani bhavincalani, vastavaniki varilo kondaru tama nalukalanu trippi granthanni caduvutaru, kani (nijaniki) adi grantham lonidi kadu; mariyu varu: "Adi allah daggara nundi vaccindi." Ani antaru, kani adi (nijaniki) allah daggara nundi vaccindi kadu, mariyu varu telisi kuda allah pai abad'dhalu palukutunnaru
